participant_1.background:
I like to take my time to look my best in the morning, so I don't mind getting up early to get ready.
my husband is a pastor.
My first organic purchase was a locally grown banana for my girlfriend.
my wife does not like me anymore.
I have a truck for my weekend adventures and a leased car for my daily commute.

participant_2.background:
I'm catching up on my reading this weekend.
I listen to music to escape from my world for a little while.
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
I eat fruits like apples and bananas for their natural sweetness.
I'm not sure my parents would approve of my music hobby, but it's something that I love and it helps me to relax.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read! I'm currently catching up on my reading this weekend.
That's great! What kind of books do you like to read?
I read all types of books, but I mostly read fiction.
That's cool! I like to read nonfiction books, but I'll read anything that's interesting.
Me too! I love to learn new things, so I'll read anything that's educational.
That's a great way to spend your time! I love to learn new things too.
What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book about the history of race horses.
That sounds interesting! I've never read anything about race horses before.
It's really interesting! I've always been interested in horses, so I thought I'd give it a try.
How do you like it so far?
It's really good! I'm learning a lot about the history of the sport and the different types of horses that are used in racing.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I'm really excited to finish it.
